ivory.core.data.index

Class Posting

  • java.lang.Object
    • ivory.core.data.index.Posting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Writable

    public class Posting
extends Object
implements Writable
    A posting, consisting of a docno and a term frequency.
    Author:
    Jimmy Lin
